name: Davide Valsecchi
introduction: Davide Valsecchi (DAV-ee-day val-SEC-ee; born January 24, 1987 in Eupilio, Como, Lombardy, Italy) is an Italian racing driver who has competed in Formula One as an occasional test driver since 2010. Valsecchi has participated in tests for the HRT, Lotus and most recently the Lotus Renault F1 Team where he currently resides as the official third driver for the team. Aside from Formula One, Valsecchi competed in the GP2 Series for a number of years before finally becoming the GP2 Champion in the 2012 season.
